org.forgerock.openam.sts.tokengeneration

Interface CTSTokenPersistence

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTSTokenPersistenceImpl

    public interface CTSTokenPersistence
    An interface to encapsulate the concerns of persisting issued tokens to the CTS, and of retrieving persisted instances (performed during token validate), and of removing persisted instances (performed during token cancellation).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CoreTokenField CTS_TOKEN_FIELD_STS_ID 
      static CoreTokenField CTS_TOKEN_FIELD_STS_TOKEN_TYPE 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteToken(String tokenId)
      Called during token cancellation
      String getToken(String tokenId)
      Called during token validation
      List<STSIssuedTokenState> listTokens(org.forgerock.util.query.QueryFilter<CoreTokenField> queryFilter)
      Returns a list of STSIssuedTokenState instances corresponding to the sts-issued tokens specified by the QueryFilter.
      void persistToken(String stsId, TokenType tokenType, String tokenString, String subjectId, String jti, long issueInstantMillis, long tokenLifetimeSeconds) 

    • Field Detail

      • CTS_TOKEN_FIELD_STS_ID

        static final CoreTokenField CTS_TOKEN_FIELD_STS_ID

      • CTS_TOKEN_FIELD_STS_TOKEN_TYPE

        static final CoreTokenField CTS_TOKEN_FIELD_STS_TOKEN_TYPE

    • Method Detail

      • persistToken

        void persistToken(String stsId,
                  TokenType tokenType,
                  String tokenString,
                  String subjectId,
                  String jti,
                  long issueInstantMillis,
                  long tokenLifetimeSeconds)
           throws CTSTokenPersistenceException
        Parameters:
        stsId - The id of the sts instance persisting the token. Will be used to query for issued tokens later.
        tokenType - The type of to-be-persisted token
        tokenString - The token to be persisted
        subjectId - The subject which this token asserts
        issueInstantMillis - millisecond time at which token is issued
        tokenLifetimeSeconds - token lifetime in seconds
        Throws:
        CTSTokenPersistenceException - thrown if the underlying CTSPersistentStore throws a CoreTokenException during the presistence operation

      • getToken

        String getToken(String tokenId)
         throws CTSTokenPersistenceException
        Called during token validation
        Parameters:
        tokenId - the id of the token to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the String representation of the token if found, or null if the token is not found
        Throws:
        CTSTokenPersistenceException - thrown if the underlying CTSPersistentStore throws a CoreTokenException during the CTS lookup

      • deleteToken

        void deleteToken(String tokenId)
          throws CTSTokenPersistenceException
        Called during token cancellation
        Parameters:
        tokenId - the id of the token to be deleted
        Throws:
        CTSTokenPersistenceException - thrown if the underlying CTSPersistentStore throws a CoreTokenException during the deletion

      • listTokens

        List<STSIssuedTokenState> listTokens(org.forgerock.util.query.QueryFilter<CoreTokenField> queryFilter)
                              throws CTSTokenPersistenceException
        Returns a list of STSIssuedTokenState instances corresponding to the sts-issued tokens specified by the QueryFilter. These queries are currently limited to a specific sts id, and an optional subject asserted by the token.
        Parameters:
        queryFilter - the QueryFilter referencing the CoreTokenFields which will guide the CTS search
        Returns:
        the non-null, possibly-empty list returned by the query.
        Throws:
        CTSTokenPersistenceException - if the query could not be successfully performed.
